mapper.select: SELECT dancode , bankcode , bankSn , srvname , roomtot , rent , apply_date , pb_ucode , agent , its_auto FROM MSTvaDANCODE WHERE rflag = '1' ORDER BY dancode, bankcode OFFSET #{strrows} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{endrows} ROWS ONLY ;
mapper.update: UPDATE MSTvaDANCODE SET rflag = '0' WHERE rflag = '1'
UPDATE MSTvaDANCODE SET rflag = '1' WHERE rflag = #{rflag}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) as cnt FROM MSTvaDANCODE a INNER JOIN MSTvaMEMBER b ON a.dancode = b.dancode AND a.bankcode = b.bankcode WHERE a.rflag = '1' ;

SELECT b.dancode , b.dongcode , b.roomno , b.bankcode , b.vaccount , b.usedate , b.send FROM MSTvaDANCODE a INNER JOIN MSTvaMEMBER b ON a.dancode = b.dancode AND a.bankcode = b.bankcode WHERE a.rflag = '1' ORDER BY b.dancode, b.dongcode, b.roomno, b.bankcode, b.vaccount OFFSET #{strrows} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{endrows} ROWS ONLY
